website_summaries.verdict: A great choice to add a bit of decorative flair to the home while getting the functionality of a handy umbrella holder.
pros: Strong metal will hold up to the occasional abuse of placing different objects into the holder
Finish is solid and durable to last a long time
cons: The holder is heavier than most other options

customer_reviews.title: This "umbrella stand" is only about 16" tall, and ...
customer_reviews.text: This "umbrella stand" is only about 16" tall, and this includes it's "feet"! This is roughly half the height it SHOULD be for to true umbrella stand. I might should have been billed as a "SWAGGER STICK STAND". It MAY have been tall enough for that?! But, it is NOT tall enough for either umbrellas or canes! Had I realized how short it is, I would NEVER have bought it! No wonder they neither gave it's dimensions or illustrated it with umbrellas in it. This "umbrella stand" is totally inadequate!
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. Doesnt take up much space and looks very elegant
customer_reviews.author: camille campbell

customer_reviews.title: Appearance is nice and we didn't realize it is SMALL (16" tall)  and NOT good for long umbrellas.
customer_reviews.text: Is exactly as it looks. Appearance is nice and it is MY fault, we didn't realize it is SMALL (16") and NOT good for long umbrellas. Bottom has a pan that catches the rain water and that is great, but we were thinking it was taller and on its own held the lpong umbrellas. Suggest it is built another 6-8" taller and charge a couple extra dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: A multipurpose accessory which looks stunning.
customer_reviews.text: Since this item has only arrived two weeks or so ago, I really can’t speak to durability. However, it seems very well suited to its intended purpose which is to hold a friend’s cane collection. It looks beautiful in my friends newly renovated apartment! The four stars for weight is because, both my friend and I have arthritic hands and while doable, we have some slight difficulty lifting it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Carrigan

customer_reviews.title: Should have returned it.
customer_reviews.text: Looks OK but very light weight and tips over very easy. Bought it for the office when we first moved in and I was too busy to return it. Also, not good for long umbrellas.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Kinda small.
customer_reviews.text: This stand is not as stable as I had hoped. I've positioned it in the corner and have been leaning my umbrellas onward to prevent tipping, but then the wall gets wet..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great size and holds 6 full size umbrellas, including one doorman sized umbrella. Fits very nicely against my wall inside my coat closet and out of view eliminating clutter in the entry way.
customer_reviews.author: John Schuldt

customer_reviews.title: very nice umbrella stand
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella stand is very nice. I like the fact that it has a flat side so it will go up against the wall. The drip pan is removable, which is nice for cleaning. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is I wish it were a little taller and heavier, but other than that it is very nice and the shipping was super fast.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it and have received many compliments
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, I started collecting umbrellas from different places I have visited, so in order to show them off I found the umbrella stand. I absolutely love it and have received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Donohoe

customer_reviews.title: Too many big holes.
customer_reviews.text: There are many big openings. The canes slip right through.
customer_reviews.author: Lura M. Hunnicutt

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: The description of this item is totally misleading. It is nowhere near Super Quality - unless they left out the word Low. It is very low quality. It is made out of cheap lightweight metal and the construction is shoddy at best. The "mahogany" color is cheap paint that rubbed off in transit. I wouldn't pay $5 for this much less the $50 that they charged. I put it right back in the box and sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Celia Aguda

customer_reviews.title: The stand is compact and easily fits in a corner flush against the wall
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! The stand is compact and easily fits in a corner flush against the wall. Not too tall which makes it easy to retrieve my short folding umbrellas easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Skovira

customer_reviews.title: Still nice, but it had the appearance of being used
customer_reviews.text: Still nice, but it had the appearance of being used, more than just the rustic look I know it is supposed to have.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Far too small. Will not hold any of my canes and only 2-3 small umbrellas
customer_reviews.author: Deborah B.

customer_reviews.title: Too small for holding umbrellas
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t see the size on the website , it is pretty small for what I wanted, but I kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: belso umbrella stand
customer_reviews.text: It could have been a little taller to fit tall umbrellas, but otherwise very attractive piece
customer_reviews.author: darlene

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Came just like the picture looked, stable against the wall, sits grrat. Looks nice!
customer_reviews.author: Genifer Groff

customer_reviews.title: very nice  stand
customer_reviews.text: This looks great in my hall way and holds a good many umbrellas. I have received many compliments on it
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: It’s smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a little taller. I should have read the dimensions. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Graham

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: Cute but not at all what I thought it was for the price. It's not even 2 ft tall.
customer_reviews.author: Loving Tess

customer_reviews.title: Glamorous but short umbrella stand
customer_reviews.text: This product is way too short for many of my umbrellas. I expected it to be taller. Love the design.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Duale

customer_reviews.title: Totally disappointed. Looking for a new one
customer_reviews.text: The item was missing the drip tray. What am I supposed to do with an umbrella stand that water can drip through? Totally disappointed. Looking for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: sdc107

customer_reviews.title: It's Functional
customer_reviews.text: Needs to be a bit taller to hold tall umbrellas. Other than that, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Melvin Wilson

customer_reviews.title: No value for my money
customer_reviews.text: Too light for umbrellas falling every time under 1or2 umbrellas
customer_reviews.author: Samia Dehkal

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: fits perfectly in a small spot and very attractive when noticed, I would recommended this sturdy little stand I am using it for canes
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Heidemann

customer_reviews.title: ... umbrella stand for my massage practice and it’s the perfect size. People love it
customer_reviews.text: I needed an umbrella stand for my massage practice and it’s the perfect size. People love it!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Kusnetz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Item was exactly as described. Very nice. Highly recommend! Tim.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy at all
customer_reviews.text: Not very big. Not sturdy at all. Not worth the price they asked for. Would not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: lovely
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece and easily fits all the umbrellas a family of 6 has. Fits flush against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Rachele L. Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This looks more beautiful in person than it does in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: K. B. Harding

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very please with my umbrella jholder !! thank you !!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Powell

customer_reviews.title: It looked nice but very lightweight and not what we were looking ...
customer_reviews.text: We returned this item as it was a flimsy. It looked nice but very lightweight and not what we were looking for. We needed something more heavyweight to hold multiple umbrella's
customer_reviews.author: Christina Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Stand is too light and tips over easily. The on ly way to stop the tipping ...
customer_reviews.text: Stand is too light and tips over easily. The on ly way to stop the tipping over is to place large stones in the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Fowke

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful/ True to color. A bit smaller than I imagined, but it fits perfectly near my front door.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I looks very nice too.
customer_reviews.text: it works perfectly for my canes and umbrellas. I looks very nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: it arrived in a damaged condition even though the packaging was fine.
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella stand was half the size and weight it should be to accommodate a couple of regular sized umbrellas.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Harris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Christmas gift and very pleased with how this looks.
customer_reviews.author: feedback

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: it was a little too small. Was looking for an 11 inches width and 24 inches height
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it does not take a lot of space and it looks nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way to small
customer_reviews.text: Very small doesn't not hold a standard umbrella, I will be returning it . Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Paul D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for smaller umbrellas
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly looks just like the picture. Its great for all my kids umbrellas. I need to order a taller one for my big umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Mer Gar

customer_reviews.title: Poor workmanship and quite narrow
customer_reviews.text: Product looks good online, however, the workmanship is of very poor quality, the metal is a lot thinner than anticipated, is quite narrow and sits very low, albeit, the height was listed on the product description, but it's too low of a height, even for a 5'6" person. Due to these factors it was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Yorkie8044

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but falls over several times a day
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but falls over several times a day, even when no one is near it. I would not recommend it. If I had liked it, I would have bought a matching one for another entryway. When I find a better one, this one is trash.
customer_reviews.author: Samosee

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this item
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on this item. It's made of plastic and so small and light weight that it flips over if you put an umbrella in it. I couldn't return it without paying a return shipping charge. Had I known that in advance too, I wouldn't have ordered it. A description of materials really needs to be added to the description. Extremely misleading.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Best umbrella stand for a small space.
customer_reviews.text: The two best things about this stand is the shape and the removable base where water can collect. The flat side easily fits into a narrow space brethren two doors in my daughter's foyer. It's a tight space, so fitting up against the wall takes up less room.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My only surprise when I opened the package was that it is not round. It's flat on the back, like a half-moon, so it will fit against the wall. Not a problem - I just didn't realize that when looking at the pictures. It is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy G. Wisgerhof

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and very sturdy. Holds 2 large and 3 small umbrellas without tipping over due to the placement of the legs,. Very nice !!
customer_reviews.author: Gerd Bucsko

customer_reviews.title: Too small & chintzy for the price
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid attention to the measurements, so my bust, but I expected this 16" stand to be at least 22-24" tall and a bit broader to hold more than just a couple of umbrellas. It's a nice design but a bit chintzy with thin metal; not something you would consider to be very durable "for the long haul". The stand would be worth about $25 or so, and good for a tiny apartment where space is at a premium.
customer_reviews.author: royhva

customer_reviews.title: Product is as expected and surprisingly lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: Umbrella holder. Elegant and great quality for the money. I expected something heavy and difficult to move, but it is not the case. Would high;y recommended to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Well built and Roomy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and roomy umbrella holder. It is holding up well on my front porch.
customer_reviews.author: John Layman

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but not worth $50
customer_reviews.text: This stand looks nice but is built with thin, lightweight metal. All of the square metal stock is thin gauged and hollow. The bottom tray is also thin gauge metal, and given the shape, is easliy knocked over. Again, it looks nice but for $50 I was hoping for a heavier, sturdier product.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Short stand
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look and style but much shorter than most umbrella stands.
customer_reviews.author: Pinda1950

customer_reviews.title: This is so awesome!! Now instead of looking in drawers and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so awesome!! Now instead of looking in drawers and a closet for umbrellas I put this stand in a useless corner that was filled with clutter next to front door and it fits perfect!! Grab and go if it’s pouring out!!Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky C.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very pretty.
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely stand that holds all the umbrellas for your whole household! Well made and very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Meren

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Should be a little heavier. Does not do well with big umbrellas
customer_reviews.author: Jazzi YaYa

customer_reviews.title: Unique umbrella stand.
customer_reviews.text: Item is beautiful and is just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Carole A. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: very nice for the money. on our front porch now, doing a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have stated, this is very light gauge metal, and seemingly not worth the price. Also, please beware of the product dimensions - THIS IS A SMALL UMBRELLA STAND. The unit is extremely small, and most of the umbrella or cane will not be supported by the tiny stand.
customer_reviews.author: TonyB74

customer_reviews.title: Nice stand!
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella stand looks nice and arrived quickly. The legs are not completely level, and they are too sturdy to bend by hand, else I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: K Zim

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight material. Because of this it tips over very easily. Walking sticks and tall umbrellas just don't work.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Rice

customer_reviews.title: Nice yet overpriced :(
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece yet too expensive . After I ordered it, I was shoppIng locally and saw similar stands for approx 1/2 price, it bothered me.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and I can't wait for the rainy weather to try it out!
customer_reviews.author: April Skinner

product_meta.title: Brelso Super Quality Umbrella Stand, Umbrella Holder, Antique Look Metal, Entry Hallway Décor, Wallside Style, w/Removable Drip Tray (Bronze)
product_meta.description: Size:BronzeThis eye-catching umbrella stand by Brelso is truly unique in design and by the antique look, Its Constructed of powerful Metal and finished with its nice colors with an amazing style and charm!!. This decorative and functional umbrella stand has a removable drip tray for easy clean up. It looks great in offices or home entryways. Adds some elegance to your entry and give your umbrellas a stylish parking place. The Brelso umbrella stands meets the high quality standards; it's an amazing gift for anyone, your friend, parent, or a coworker.
feature_bullets: Creatively crafted antique style umbrella stand.
Decorative home décor and fits medium and small size umbrellas.
Comes with an inner removable drip tray to catch the drips and for easy clean.
A Must Have For the Elegant Office or Home.
A amazing gift for anyone, friend, parent, or a coworker.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars128 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
